Detailed Description

QtScript expressions containing triggers.

If the expressions evaluates to true, the condition is fulfilled, usually signalling the start of a Task. The expression itself is a simple string, and it contains function calls that hook into the respective Trigger objects

Member Function Documentation

bool Condition::evaluate (  )  [slot]

Force condition evaluation. This slot is usually called from the Trigger object when it itself changes state and wishes to propagate the changes

void Condition::stateChanged ( bool  b  )  [signal]

emitted when the condition evaluation changes state, either going from true to false or the other way around

Parameters:
b the new state
